attributes.action: Stop racial descrimination against the English and give the English people their own parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create an English Parliament to control the affairs of England. Ensure English Taxes are used to benefit English people, protect us from being ruled by foreigners, and plan for armed services being relocated from Scotland in the event of Scottish independence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
